      限定符和类型 方法和说明

    • org.apache.catalina.startup中ServletContainerInitializer的使用

      类型参数类型为ServletContainerInitializer的org.apache.catalina.startup中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.Map<ServletContainerInitializer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>>> ContextConfig.initializerClassMap
      Map of ServletContainerInitializer to classes they expressed interest in.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.util.Set<ServletContainerInitializer>> ContextConfig.typeInitializerMap
      Map of Types to ServletContainerInitializer that are interested in those types.

    • org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server中ServletContainerInitializer的使用

      实现ServletContainerInitializer的org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  WsSci
      Registers an interest in any class that is annotated with ServerEndpoint so that Endpoint can be published via the WebSocket server.
